tool_description: This API verifies if an employee's name is found in the Provident Fund (PF) list of their employer by taking company and employee information as input.

api_list.name: GET Call
api_list.description: Fetches the API result using the request ID received in previous responses.

required_parameters.name: request_id
required_parameters.description: The unique identifier for the request made to the API.

api_list.name: EPFO Employee Verification
api_list.description: Submits company and employee information to verify if the employee is listed in the PF records of the employer. A GET call is required to fetch the result using the request ID received in response.
